title: Will Enterprise Rent-A-Car move to a new location since it will become part of the Trader Joe\'s site?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20111223/ARTICLES/111229850?p=all&tc=pgall The manager of Enterprise said this: Enterprise Rent-A-Car drivers exclusively exit at 47th Street, said Colt Harness, the branch manager, explaining that the shortcut allows them to avoid South College and Oleander.
